summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AI Voice Detection API system. Backend API endpoints fully functional with 92.3% success rate. Frontend UI working perfectly with all interactive components operational and proper error handling.

minor_bugs.issue: Invalid language validation returns 422 instead of expected 400
minor_bugs.impact: Minor - Pydantic validation returns technically correct 422 status

working_endpoints: POST /api/voice-detection - Voice analysis with all validations

passed_tests: All 5 language support (Tamil, English, Hindi, Malayalam, Telugu)
Response format validation (status, language, classification, confidenceScore, explanation)
Error handling for invalid audio format and base64
Frontend file upload with MP3 validation
API key input with show/hide toggle
Results display with classification badge and confidence meter
Error handling display for invalid API key
